scripts.cucumberTest: npx cucumber-js tests/features/**/*.feature --require tests/steps/**/*.js --require setup/hooks.js --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --format progress
scripts.testother: npm run test && npm run playwrightTest
scripts.testfirefox: npx cucumber-js tests/features/**/*.feature --require tests/steps/**/*.js --require setup/hooks.js --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --format progress --tags "@firefox"
